titleStmt.title: An anniuersarie memoriall of Englands deliuery from the Spanish inuasion deliuered in a sermon on Psal. 48. 7,8. By Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, at the Golden Lion in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Englands deliuerie from the Spanish inuasion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Lion in Pauls Churchyard
